decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (R/227/01 and LP/01. Received: 30th November 2015.  R/227/02 Rev A Received: 7th December 2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  walls of the outbuilding without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time as a self contained residential unit and shall be used only for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 5 Beverley Avenue, Hounslow, TW4 5HF.

Condition : 5 - The windows and door formed in the side elevation of the outbuilding facing into the garden of the site shall fitted with obscure glazing or opaque film above 1.7m above finished floor level  and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing or opaque film
description: Retrospective application for erection of a single storey outbuilding at the rear garden of the house
